trans-unit.source: To implement a custom upgrade initiator, inherit from this <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil implementere en egendefinert oppgradering oppretter, arver fra dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
trans-unit.target: Det er et eksempel på en dataflyt oppgradering å bygge en komprimeringsdataflyten direkte over transportdataflyten.

trans-unit.source: This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen brukes med <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>implementere en egendefinert dataflyten oppgradering.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor>

trans-unit.source: For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en detaljert beskrivelse av oppgraderingsprosessen, kan du se <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> method can be implemented to do asynchronous processing that initiates an upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref> metoden kan brukes til å gjøre Asynkron behandling som starter en oppgradering.

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade%2A> and returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade%2A>og returnerer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten oppgraderes.

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden for å kalle når den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade*>er fullført.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: State information about the status of the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Tilstand informasjon om statusen for det asynkrone kallet.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to be passed into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.EndInitiateUpgrade*> method.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.IAsyncResult>som skal sendes til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.EndInitiateUpgrade*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.EndInitiateUpgrade*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: This method is the asynchronous callback method that is called after <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.BeginInitiateUpgrade*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er den asynkrone tilbakeringing som kalles etter <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.BeginInitiateUpgrade*>er fullført.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.BeginInitiateUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using this method, see the remarks in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker denne metoden, kan du se merknader i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.InitiateUpgrade%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_IAsyncResult" name="IAsyncResult" href=""></xref> returned from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.BeginInitiateUpgrade*> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_IAsyncResult" name="IAsyncResult" href=""> </xref> returnert fra den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.BeginInitiateUpgrade*>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator.BeginInitiateUpgrade*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer oppgraderte dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Returns the content type of the next upgrade to be performed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer innholdstypen for neste oppgraderingen utføres.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a set of upgrade content types supported by the upgrade provider in the order in which they are expected.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer et sett med oppgradering innholdstyper som støttes av oppgradering leverandøren i rekkefølgen som de forventes.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade providers that support a single upgrade return only a single value.
trans-unit.target: Oppgradering leverandører som støtter en enkelt oppgradering returnere en enkeltverdi.

trans-unit.source: Upgrade providers that support multiple upgrades return the values in order (for example, compression content type followed by the security content type).
trans-unit.target: Oppgradering leverandører som støtter flere oppgraderer returnerer i rekkefølge (for eksempel komprimering innholdstype etterfulgt av innholdstypen security).

trans-unit.source: Returns the content type of the next upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer innholdstypen for neste oppgraderingen.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the upgrade of the stream by requesting the other end of its connection to upgrade the channel transport layer.
trans-unit.target: Starter oppgraderingen av dataflyten ved å be om den andre enden av tilkoblingen til å oppgradere kanal transportlaget.

trans-unit.source: This method can be called multiple times for each upgrade supported by the upgrade provider.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan kalles flere ganger for hver oppgradering støttes av leverandøren oppgradering.

trans-unit.source: For example, an upgrade provider that supports compression and security would call this method twice: first to upgrade the default transport streaming for compression, and second to upgrade the security.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en oppgradering leverandør som støtter komprimering og sikkerhet vil kalle denne metoden to ganger: først oppgradere standard transport streaming for komprimering og andre oppgradere sikkerheten.

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls to this method should pass in the upgrade stream from the previous call.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende kall til denne metoden skal gå i oppgradering dataflyten fra forrige Oppkalling.

trans-unit.source: The stream to be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten oppgraderes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the upgraded stream.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer oppgraderte dataflyten.
